name: Live☆Twin Ki-sikil Frost
effectText: If you control a "Lil-la" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Live☆Twin Ki-sikil Frost" once per turn this way. If a card(s) is added from the Main Deck to your opponent's hand by a card effect (except during the Damage Step), while you control an "Evil★Twin" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Live☆Twin Ki-sikil Frost" once per turn.
